item.title: Custom Crown Assistance please
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

I followed this tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363788.0.html

Does anyone know why other players cannot see the custom crowns I add in?
I’ve added in the:

if (playerRights == 4) { } //just ignore this. But do add it. if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(3); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }
but it only shows for me/the player with it. Where else am I supposed to add on the server side to get them to show?

Read full topic
